definition: produced or growing in extreme abundance, a person who drinks alcohol to excess habitually
details:
adjective
- produced or growing in extreme abundance
= synonyms: exuberant
- full of juice
= example: full of juice
= synonyms: juicy, succulent
- characterized by extravagance and profusion
= synonyms: lavish, lucullan, plush, plushy
noun
- a person who drinks alcohol to excess habitually
= synonyms: souse
